fields.name: launchUrl
fields.label: Launch URL
fields.description: Full URL to the widget launch script (e.g., 'https://widgets.nasm.org/bmi/launch.js')

fields.name: containerId
fields.label: Container ID
fields.description: ID of the container div that the widget script targets (e.g., 'bwp-node')

fields.name: elementName
fields.label: Widget Element Name (Optional)
fields.description: HTML element name to create (e.g., 'bmi-calculator'). Leave empty if widget script creates its own elements.

fields.name: attributes
fields.label: Widget Attributes
fields.description: HTML attributes for the widget element (e.g., 'data-lead-gen="false" data-unit-height="in"')

fields.name: styles
fields.label: CSS Styles
fields.description: CSS styles to apply to the widget (e.g., '.bmi-header { background-color: var(--brand-color-highlight) !important; }')
